00052 void GComponent::set_bounds(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2) {
00053     clip.x1 = x1;
00054     clip.y1 = y1;
00055     clip.x2 = x2;
00056     clip.y2 = y2;
00057 }

00061 //----------- Begin of function GComponent::init --------//
00062 void GComponent::repaint(VgaBuf *vgaBuf) {
00063     if ( is_shown )
00064         paint(vgaBuf);
00065 }

00069 //----------- Begin of function GComponent::on_event ------//
00072 void GComponent::on_event() {
00073     if ( !is_shown )
00074         return;
00075 
00076     if( mouse.is_key_event() ) {
00077         on_key(mouse.scan_code, mouse.event_skey_state);
00078     }
00079     // 0: L button
00080     else if ( mouse.any_click(clip.x1, clip.y1, clip.x2, clip.y2, 0) ) {
00081         is_active = true;
00082         on_mouse_click(mouse.click_x(MOUSE_LEFT) - clip.x1,
00083                        mouse.click_y(MOUSE_LEFT) - clip.y1, MOUSE_LEFT);
00084     }
00085     // 1: R button
00086     else if ( mouse.any_click(clip.x1, clip.y1, clip.x2, clip.y2, 1) ) {
00087         is_active = true;
00088         on_mouse_click(mouse.click_x(MOUSE_RIGHT) - clip.x1,
00089                        mouse.click_y(MOUSE_RIGHT) - clip.y1, MOUSE_RIGHT);
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 //------------- End of function GComponent::on_event ------//
00094 
00095 //----------- Begin of function GComponent::get ------//
00098 bool GComponent::is_inside(int x, int y) {
00099     return ( x >= clip.x1 && y >= clip.y1
00100              && x <= clip.x2 && y <= clip.y2 );
00101 }
00102 
00103 //------------- End of function GComponent::get ------//
